governance_hooks.description: Guardian review before slashing validator stake

demo.name: Meta-Agentic α-AGI Jobs Demo
demo.narrative:
Guided by non-technical owners, the orchestrator composes a full-stack alpha operation that
senses market anomalies, evolves strategies, designs execution blueprints, coordinates
capital, and executes under on-chain governance controls without manual coding.

params.description: Turnkey procurement, installation, and validation of polymer superconductive retrofits across datacenters.
params.title: Superconductive Grid Retrofit Initiative

params.tx_summary: Simulated validation commit for superconductive retrofit job
